archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: The collection contains a color sketch of Private James Maloney, a soldier in the 116th Regiment, NY Infantry.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Sketch of James Maloney, Ms2010-021, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: The Sketch of James Maloney was acquired by Special Collections prior to 2009.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement and description of the Sketch of James Maloney commenced and was completed in April, 2010

bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: During the Civil War James Maloney was enlisted in Company H of the 116th regiment of the New York.
For sources and more information on the 116th New York Infantry: http://www.itd.nps.gov/cwss/index.html

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection contains a color sketch of James Maloney.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged by material type.
